piece.name: The Midnight Bloom 2
piece.materials: 100% New Zealand Wool, Cotton Backing, Latex Adhesive

story: This piece was inspired by the quiet solitude of midnight gardens. Every tuft was punched by hand over the course of 45 hours, layering distinct shades of midnight blue and charcoal to create depth and movement. The organic shapes represent the untamed growth of nature in darkness, crafted to bring a grounding, artisanal presence to your space.

featured.alt: Close up texture of the handmade wool rug showing intricate details
featured.label: Final Texture

steps.alt: Tufting gun and yarn spools during the creation process
Hand shearing the rug surface for an even finish

verification.quote: Hecho a mano con amor y paciencia
